READY NOW! NEW CONSTRUCTION! EXTRAORDINARY PLAN OVER 4600 SQ FT. BEAUTIFUL HOMESITE WITH WALK OUT BASEMENT. LOADED WITH ARCHITECTURAL DETAILS THROUGHOUT.
